body:
# Projects

## arbb-vm 
ArBB virtual machine bindings are available [here](http://github.com/svenssonjoel/arbb-vm)

## EmbArBB
[EmbArBB](http://svenssonjoel.github.com/EmbArBB) is a language for data parallel programming embedded in Haskell. This project implements a higher-level interface to ArBB compared to the arbb-vm bindings above (arbb-vm is used in the backend of this implementation). 

## RayCast
A retro style raycasting graphics engine (like in the first wolfenstein3D game) implemented in Haskell and C. I hope to make a dungeon exploration game (in the style of Eye of the Beholder) using this graphics engine at some time.

![rayscreens](http://svenssonjoel.github.com/rayscreens.jpg)

At first the code was much influenced by the book "Gardens of Imagination" but digressed quite a bit after a while. [repository](http://github.com/svenssonjoel/RayCast)

## Obsidian
Obsidian is a GPGPU programming language embedded in Haskell. Three different versions are available on github. For more information about Obsidian see my work [webpage](http://www.cse.chalmers.se/~joels)

### GCDObsidian 
The latest version that also implements Push-Arrays in the Obisidan setting. 

### ArrowObsidian
Obsidian with an Arrow-like interface.

### MonadObsidian
Similar to ArrowObsidian but with a monad based interface.
name: Svenssonjoel.github.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
